projectsData.title: ReCommando - Movie Recommendation System
projectsData.description: A movie recommendation system utilizing content-based filtering to suggest personalized movies based on user preferences.

experiences.title: Full-Stack & Mobile App Development
experiences.description: Building innovative and impactful applications with precision.
experiences.details: Designed, developed, and deployed 15+ projects using modern web and mobile technologies. Built scalable applications leveraging the MERN stack for web and Flutter for cross-platform mobile apps. Notable projects include Amusik (a web music player), reCommando (a movie recommendation system using ML), and Moonlit (an e-commerce app).

experiences.title: Flutter Development & Continuous Learning
experiences.description: Expanding technical expertise through hands-on projects and research.
experiences.details: Completed a Flutter development course from Brain Mentors, gaining expertise in building scalable mobile applications. Developed Moonlit, an e-commerce app with Firebase integration. Explored Data Science by building reCommando, a personalized movie recommendation system powered by machine learning. Currently learning DBMS and system design principles.

experiences.title: Hackathons & Competitive Development
experiences.description: Solving real-world problems through innovation and collaboration.
experiences.details: Actively participating in hackathons and tech competitions. Developed 'Tripizzy' during the Smart Hackathon, a trip management app that optimizes travel plans based on population density. Gained experience in rapid prototyping, problem-solving, and working under tight deadlines. Also explored AI/ML-driven solutions for various projects.

experiences.title: Freelance & Client-Based Projects
experiences.description: Delivering tailored digital solutions to businesses and startups.
experiences.details: Worked on multiple client projects, including AapKaGhar, a real estate platform developed for Goodluck Company. Focused on creating highly responsive and user-friendly web applications using the MERN stack. Ensured seamless UI/UX, performance optimization, and business scalability.

experiences.title: Web Development Internship at Traincape
experiences.description: Bridging technology and business with scalable web solutions.
experiences.details: Currently working as a Web Development Intern at Traincape Industries, focusing on building scalable, high-performance web applications. Gaining hands-on experience in full-stack development, performance optimization, and collaborative problem-solving in a real-world business environment.

experiences.title: Software Research & System Design
experiences.description: Exploring software architecture, data structures, and business-driven development.
experiences.details: Developed a Smart Parking System, focusing on efficiency, automation, and IoT integration. Conducted research on Software Requirement Specification (SRS) documentation, learning how to plan and document large-scale projects effectively. Also explored database management and system design for optimized application performance.

experiences.title: Business & Tech Synergy
experiences.description: Merging technology with strategic business insights.
experiences.details: Pursuing interests in business development alongside technical skills. Working at Traincape has provided exposure to how businesses leverage technology. Additionally, considering an MBA with a focus on management and entrepreneurship to bridge the gap between tech innovation and business impact.
